full_summary:
=================

### Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) Notice for Security Screening Equipment

#### Background

The Government of Canada issues this announcement to declare the results of the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for Security Screening Equipment, which was publicized on January 10, 2023.

#### Key Requirements

The ITQ invited interested parties to pre-qualify for the procurement of two types of security screening equipment:

1.  **Conveyor-Style Baggage X-Ray Machines (X-Ray)**: A system designed to inspect baggage for security purposes.
2.  **Walk-Through Metal Detectors (WTMD)**: A device used to scan individuals for security threats.

#### Qualified Respondents

The following companies have been declared as Qualified Respondents (QRs) for the respective streams:

*   **Conveyor-Style Baggage X-Ray Machines (X-Ray)**
    *   Astrophysics Inc.
    *   K' (Prime) Technologies Inc.
    *   Rapiscan Systems Inc.
    *   Scintrex Trace Corporation
    *   Smiths Detection Montreal Inc.
*   **Walk-Through Metal Detectors (WTMD)**
    *   Astrophysics Inc.
    *   K' (Prime) Technologies Inc.
    *   Rapiscan Systems Inc.
    *   Smiths Detection Montreal Inc.

Only the QRs listed above will be invited to participate in the next stages of the procurement process.

#### Additional Information

You can view the full ITQ notice, including the evaluation results, on [Ariba discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/).

---

### Response Information

For any inquiries regarding this ITQ notice, please contact Lisa Golab at **lisa.golab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**.

---

### Notice Date and Closing Date

This notice was published on October 27, 2023. The ITQ closed on January 25, 2023.
